title: Apple's Song
description: Sixteen year old Apple's mother dies right before she reveals the truth to her about who her father is. Three months after her mother's sudden death, Apple and her two best friends get invited to a little getaway in Austria where her godfather Moses lives. In Austria, Apple encounters God and an angel visitation. Will Apple ever learn who her biological father is? If so, will she break her father's heart the same way her mother did?
author: Blake  Ryan
